title: lagging and jittering when ping and fps are normal
body:
This issue of mine started a few days ago, my game lags and jitters every few seconds, and if I unlock my camera and move it even that lags and jumps allot, making it impossible to do anything in the game because it gets my killed. Again my ping and fps are normal and I have had my graphics down to all low and nothing changed. I have tried allot of different methods to fix the problem but none have worked
Please if annoying is having or has had similar issues please tell me.

replies.body:
Hey FOundneMO,

Your issue is actually pretty interesting.  Your description points to it being a type of FPS issue, but you stated that your FPS remains stable and doesn't change.  Can you reply back to me and attach the following two logs?  It should help me rule out your hardware/software as a possible root cause to this issue:

1) Dxdiag information: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5

2) Your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7 

Looking forward to your response!

> Hey FOundneMO,
> 
> Your issue is actually pretty interesting.  Your description points to it being a type of FPS issue, but you stated that your FPS remains stable and doesn't change.  Can you reply back to me and attach the following two logs?  It should help me rule out your hardware/software as a possible root cause to this issue:
> 
> 1) Dxdiag information: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5
> 
> 2) Your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7 
> 
> Looking forward to your response!

I've been having the exact same issues, all steps in the connection issues FAQ have been done for months (haven't changed any settings since then), haven't changed any hardware, and haven't changed any drivers. The issue started when I downloaded the patch for Azir release, with extremely rare cases of the "attempting to reconnect" window popped up in game beforehand, and now its every 30 seconds in every single game that I try to play. I have run a speedtest when the "attempting to reconnect" window popped up in game, and had a connection speed of 51 mbs down 3.2 mbs up. I have run [this](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) with the only major aberration showing my router due to its lack of firewall.

My system specs can be seen *link removed due to security concerns*. The only thing thats on the low end for LoL is my processor, but it was running League fine until the Azir 4.16 patch.

It's not a hardware problem, connection problem, or driver problem on my end. That leaves a packet routing, patch code, or server issue as the main suspects.

Hmmm...it is hard to really say what could be the root cause.  The best way for us to start investigating and ruling out possible root causes is to take an in-depth look at your Network Configuration.  Unfortunately this information contains quite a bit of sensitive information and therefore I do not want you posting it here on the Boards.

Make sure to [submit a request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new) to us here in Player Support so that one of our Tech Specialists can analyze the following network logs and determine where the issue might lie:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
dArtagnan you da real mvp{{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}}
Hello! I have a similar problem, but cannot send you any log except the one attached to the messages (because the .r3d is too big? 5mb :S) What do i do?
Is there any recent R3d Log that is under the size limit?  It would be extremely helpful in narrowing down the root cause to this issue!
This one should do the tricks, i think. I will wait for your reply!

I went ahead and took at this log too and it appears that your hardware/software is up to date and running League of Legends normally.  At this point, it does appear to be a type of connection issue.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in this guide:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26932010-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If you are still experiencing the same issues, regardless of these steps then don't throw in the towel!  Make sure to [submit a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new) to Player Support and include the following information so that we can investigate further!

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
Thank you for your time! I will make sure every step is done in the next few days i'm a bit busy in the upcoming days! I hope it will solve my problem :).

To say it bluntly, none of what that guy dartargan says will fix anything. He just copies and paste the little network list. After you provide him with the info he tells you to wait while they get an expert. The expert in a nutshell tells you theres nothing they can do or the problem is coming from your ISP. It's a fraud. I've done this 3 times.
Big problem, each link doesn't work on my end. none. Any ideas?
I have the same problem, finally I fixed it with disable the Movement Prediction in game setting, hope that helps.
dead game

it is very annoying, I really don't want to re install the game, takes waay too long, ive heard people who have had similar problems and said that it is because of the new patches and it will return to normal after a week or so but idk, I hope that is the case.
me too, form 4.16, in summoner rift i have jitter with normal ping and normal fps, i hope next patch resolve it :(

I had this problem for the past couple days and have just realized what was wrong with my game was actually my keyboard, if you have this problem in 2017 make sure to check that your keyboard does not have an option to jitter buttons on your keyboard, when i hold down any button (including space) when i have this option enabled it simply presses a button multiple times when held down instead of staying held which makes it the equivalent of me spam pressing a button. the option on my keyboard looks like two arrows conjoined facing to the right, the button is on the keyboard, once disabled your game should work perfectly.
Hope this helped some people :)

> [{quoted}](name=FOundneMO,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WWjikkYv,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-09-17T19:44:21.349+0000)

> This issue of mine started a few days ago, my game lags and jitters every few seconds, and if I unlock my camera and move it even that lags and jumps allot, making it impossible to do anything in the game because it gets my killed. Again my ping and fps are normal and I have had my graphics down to all low and nothing changed. I have tried allot of different methods to fix the problem but none have worked
> Please if annoying is having or has had similar issues please tell me.


I have normal ping 266ms but lag  like 450+ ping how fix it?

Just for the record, you can get lag without it being frames or ping. That's generally from your computer's CPU, or some other component. League can be overburdening the processor, or some background process can be doing it, while the video and network are still fine.

I've had that precise problem with League, recently. Two patches back, I think, League suddenly started jerking around without the FPS or ping falling significantly. That was the processor struggling to keep up with the game, for whatever reason.
Ping 300+ n Ping Spikes
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/O7y2trgI-fix-attempting-to-reconnect-perfect-ping

same problem
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EPsof7M0-ping-300-n-ping-spikes

Hi all, I had similar problem like you. Lags, disconnects every 1 min... Then, I re-installed League, closed antivirus, firewall, retarted/reset router, modem.

I solved everthing by setting google's public dns and opened league port tcp/upd in my router. I'm now playing without lag or disconnect since a week.
I just sent in a ticket hope they can help me

I love how i've been contacting my provider and riot for a week now and still having this issue =D
Seems the packets get out of canada and die right before they hit riot.
Im having the same problem exceot my ping goes up right when the game starts and I tried with other games it's normal
same here, started few days ago, cant play properly at all, ive sent a message to Riot on their website leaving my email so ii here anything from them I will put it on here for you guys

The same thing is happening to me. Ping and fps are normal but there's still lag around every 10 seconds and it's really annoying. This has been happening since the patch that inserted the Azir loading screen.
Same i cant playing anything with out lagging or dcing and my patcher wont patch the game is i'm about to quit the game after 4 long years of playing.
